attributes.action: People who fail their practical driving test should be eligible for a resit.
attributes.additional_details: I want to do this because I feel that many people like myself, have sadly failed there practical tests near the lead up to the new examination on the 4th December 2017.
attributes.background: People who have failed their driving test before the 4th of December 2017 should be eligible for a second chance. We should all be given a opportunity to try again rather than wasting more money on lessons to tackle the new driving test style.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.


You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
